Package org.elasticsearch.index.similarity

Class BooleanSimilarityProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.index.similarity.AbstractSimilarityProvider
      • org.elasticsearch.index.similarity.BooleanSimilarityProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SimilarityProvider

    public class BooleanSimilarityProvider
extends AbstractSimilarityProvider
    SimilarityProvider for the BooleanSimilarity, which is a simple similarity that gives terms a score equal to their query boost only. This is useful in situations where a field does not need to be scored by a full-text ranking algorithm, but rather all that matters is whether the query terms matched or not.
